name: Danmaku shooter
description:
Made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020, mixing the genres of a first person shooter and a danmaku/bullet hell.

Controls:

  • WASD, Space, Left Shift for Movement.
  • 1, 2 and 3 to switch weapons.
  • Left click to fire.

Your lives are shown on the top left corner of your HUD, There are only 5 custom waves, after beating the final one you enter the endless mode where waves are randomly generated.
